title: Letter To The Shareholders - Annual Report F.Y. 2024-25 30 May - HUL announces 92nd AGM, FY24-25 Annual Report link, Rs.24 dividend, and dividend payment dates.

title: Notice Of 92Nd AGM Scheduled On 30Th June 2025 29 May - HUL announces 92nd AGM on 30 June 2025; declares ₹53 dividend/share; re-appoints directors; appoints secretarial and cost auditors.
date: 29 May - HUL announces 92nd AGM on 30 June 2025; declares ₹53 dividend/share; re-appoints directors; appoints secretarial and cost auditors.

title: Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting (BRSR) 29 May - HUL files FY25 Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report with SEBI, detailing ESG progress and assurance.
